attributes.action: request HM The Queen  to remove Dr Rowan Williams from his position as Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Archbishop of Canterbury has proved that he is unfit to hold the office. His belief that we will have to accommodate Sharia law within the UK shows how totally out of touch he is with the beliefs of the vast majority, and it is a betrayal of the values of our Judeo-Christian heritage.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "request HM The Queen to remove Dr Rowan Williams from his position as Archbishop of Canterbury."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20406


Prime Minister's Office
